mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes the articles entitled "Vacation By The Sea: Asilomar" , "Now Is The Time To Plan For Summer", "Stampede In San Luis County", "Portland Has A Hoedown", "Meet Our Guest Caller: Mel Day", and "Round-Up In Quadruplicate". This edition also includes the monthly articles entitled "On The Record", "Round the Outside Ring", "The Square of the Month" and "From the Floor" (letters to the editor). The "Green Sheet Of Local Southern California News" features, "Square Dance Show to be Produced".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
